mil3.2.8:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘namarupan’ti, tattha katamam namam, katamam rupan”ti.
mil3.2.8:1.3: “Yam tattha, maharaja, olarikam, etam rupam, ye tattha sukhuma cittacetasika dhamma, etam naman”ti.
mil3.2.8:1.4: “Bhante nagasena, kena karanena namamyeva na patisandahati, rupamyeva va”ti?
mil3.2.8:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kukkutiya kalalam na bhaveyya, andampi na bhaveyya, yanca tattha kalalam, yanca andam, ubhopete annamannupanissita, ekatova nesam uppatti hoti;
mil3.2.8:2.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yadi tattha namam na bhaveyya, rupampi na bhaveyya, yanceva tattha namam, yanceva rupam, ubhopete annamannupanissita, ekatova nesam uppatti hoti.
